name: Support Line
description: The Family Resource Center provides support line for families of children with developmental disabilities from 0-22 years of age in San Mateo County. The support line is staffed by parents who share the common experience of parenting a child with developmental disabilities. The line is open from 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Monday thru Friday, or leave a message and a parent will get back to you as soon as possible.
